1558040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Tokenpack 18 - Undead 1
1558040.description:
Jans Tokenpack 18 - Undead 1

The Undead are one of my favorite encounters in roleplaying games. They are
reanimated by supernatural forces, and have a mission. Their mission can be what their master instructed them, or just simply,
eating your brains .
Lock your heroes up in a country house and have them be swarmed by a
horde of zombies . Or maybe your adventurers are haunted by
spirits from their past . This pack contains enough challenges to
keep your players entertained for a while :). Enjoy!
This pack includes:
  • Banshee
  • Bone Naga
  • Crawling Claw
  • Flame Skull
  • Ghast
  • Ghost
  • Ghoul
  • Horse Skeleton
  • Minotaur Skeleton
  • Mummy
  • Ogre Zombie
  • Shadow
  • Skeleton
  • Specter
  • Warhorse Skeleton
  • Wight
  • Will-o'-Wisp
  • Zombie Male
  • Zombie Female
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
